DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Characterizing Adipose Tissue Leukocytes Flow Cytometry/Microscopy Lean , Obese Psoriatic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity insulin resistance-associated metabolic disorder hallmark risk factor type 2 diabetes metabolic syndrome . It also often link cardiovascular disease , certain cancer ( e.g. , colorectal , esophageal , endometrial , ovarian ) , inflammatory disease ( e.g. , psoriasis , osteoarthritis , inflammatory bowel disease ) .The phenotyping subcutaneous adipose tissue ( SAT ) hematopoetic cell obese subject flow cytometry , microscopy gene expression enable u identify inflammation tissue may help u understand cause consequence obesity order determine cell might implicate initiation and/or progression aforementioned disease .
DOC.criteria: Psoriatic lean cohort ( BMI 1824.9 Kg/m2 ) : moderate severe plaquetype , least 5 % BSA Psoriatic obese cohort ( BMI 3040 Kg/m2 ) : moderate severe plaquetype , least 5 % BSA Lean/nonpsoriatic cohort : BMI 1824.9 Kg/m2 Overweight/obese nonpsoriatic cohort : BMI 3040 Kg/m2 Subjects must 1865 year age Having receive systemic treatment psoriasis within last 30 day history bleed disorder weight loss 10 pound last four week current smoker Known diagnosis unrelated autoimmune disease inflammatory disease ( i.e . lupus , atopic dermatitis , rheumatoid arthritis ) . Currently take NSAIDS , aspirin , ( > week , stop < 30 day ago ) . Aspirin 81mg may permit Framingham Risk Score < 10 Having receive antiinflammatory medication within last 30 day Current use anticoagulant LFTs > 2 x upper normal limit HIV infection Pregnant Less 6 week post partum history cardiovascular disease ( MI , CHF , CVA ) Any cancer diagnosis within last 5 year Symptoms acute illness upper respiratory infection , bronchitis , gastroenteritis , fever within 3 day Visit 1 Any medical , psychological social condition , opinion Investigator , would jeopardize health wellbeing participant study procedure integrity data ingestion DHA fish oil within last 90 day hypertension define > 140 systolic > 90 diastolic 10 minute rest 2 antihypertensive Use statins within last 30 day
